nodes.documentation: @dev This emits when the escrow contract receives an ERC721 token.
nodes.name: TitleReceived

nodes.documentation: @dev This emits when the ownership is transferred out of the escrow contract.
nodes.name: TitleCeded

nodes.documentation: @dev This emits when the beneficiary endorsed the the holder's transfer.
nodes.name: TransferEndorsed
